name: G4 | Barksdale | sphynx
bio: What's up! My name's G4 | Barksdale | sphynx. I once peed on King Henry VIII's cat. They had it coming. Sometimes I daydream of a life full of glaring at the neighbour's cat, chocolate, and practicing witchcraft. Our friendship will be brilliant, gullible, and full of steak.
